text: Motion
Fuyuko...
...What?
As expected... you aren't satisfied?

Hah...?
Why are you bringing this up out of nowhere?

Sorry... I really did try to negotiate more
jobs for you ───

...It can't be helped.
It's a problem of supply and demand.

Right now, she's the one that's been deemed an idol,
and Fuyu just isn't neccessary... That's all.

Hmm... That might be the case
But I'm wondering how you yourself feel about this, Fuyuko.

I you have anything you want to say, please do.
Be it complaints or worries, whenever you feel comfortable is fine.
...You're seriously saying that to Fuyu, right?

That Fuyu is also special,
not just Asahi.
Ah, yeah...

What do you mean by that?
What's "special" mean to you?

──── Ah, okay, okay...
I wasn't really expecting a proper answer from you anyway.

Right now, the reality of the situation is that
my role is to make her look better. Nothing more, nothing lese.
Motion

...I'll accept that.
But, if you start feeling unhappy, please tell me anytime.
Motion

......
...there's no way.
